TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewButtonCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 显示在 控件中使用的类似按钮的用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Displays a button-like user interface (UI) for use in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于显示类似按钮的 UI 的专用类型。 The class is a specialized type of used to display a button-like UI. 专用于保存此类型的单元格的列类型。 is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下, 初始化为新的。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在现有的后面对列中的单元格进行样式设置, 请将列的属性设置为要用作模式的单元格。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 若要响应用户按钮单击, 请处理或事件。To respond to user button clicks, handle the or event. 在事件处理程序中, 可以使用属性来确定单击是否发生了按钮列。In the event handler, you can use the property to determine whether the click occurred a the button column. 您可以使用属性来确定特定按钮单元中是否发生了单击。You can use the property to determine whether the click occurred in a particular button cell. 此列的单元格相关属性是模板单元的名称相同的属性的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元的属性值将仅影响基于更改后添加的模板的单元格。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 但是, 更改列的单元格相关属性值将更新列中的模板单元和所有其他单元, 并在必要时刷新列显示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. > [!NOTE] > 启用视觉样式后, 将使用绘制按钮列中的按钮, 并且通过属性 (如) 指定的单元样式不起作用。When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a , and cell styles specified through properties such as have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对特定行执行操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to perform actions on particular rows. 使用单个对象时, 可以使用类似的代码。You can use similar code when working with individual objects. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序首先确定按钮单元上的单击是否为, 然后检索与该行关联的业务对象。In this example, a event handler first determines whether a click is on a button cell, then retrieves a business object associated with the row. 此示例摘自[了如何:访问 Windows 窗体 DataGridViewComboBoxCell "下拉列表](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md)中的对象。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/vb/form1.vb#100)]

para.span: 当从派生类派生并向其添加新属性时, 请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 还应调用基类的方法, 以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当从派生的类派生并将新属性添加到派生类时, 重写方法。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写时, 调用基类的方法, 以便将基类的属性复制到新的单元格, 并确保还复制已添加到派生类的任何属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用 方法，则在引用 属性时将会调用此方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 要获取或设置 属性，必须添加对与 .NET Framework 一起安装的 Accessibility 程序集的引用。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的属性,并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性, 该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#10)]

returns.span: 的值；或者，如果 为 ，则为所有者列的 值。

span.span: The value of the or the value of the owning column if is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于检索共享行中的单元格的文本, 此值无法在本地存储单元格值并保持共享。This method is useful to retrieve the text of a cell in a shared row, which cannot store cell values locally and remain shared. 由于共享行的索引为-1, 因此必须传入实际的行索引。You must pass in the actual row index because shared rows have indexes of -1. 有关行共享的详细信息, 请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

related.span: 缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法

span.span: Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 。

span.span: A that contains the event data.

param.name: rowIndex
param.span: 该单元格的父行索引。

summary.span: 指示焦点位于行中的某个单元格上按下某个键时是否取消共享该行。

span.span: Indicates whether a row is unshared if a key is pressed while the focus is on a cell in the row.

returns.span: 如果用户按下 SPACE 键（不包括组合键），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user pressed the SPACE key without modifier keys; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在方法之前调用。 The method is called just before the method. 如果对具有`true`相同参数的调用具有取消共享行`rowIndex`的效果, 则该方法必须返回。It must return `true` if the call to with the same argument has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`. 否则应返回`false` 。It should return `false` otherwise. 有关行共享的详细信息, 请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

related.span: 缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法

span.span: Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在方法之前调用。 The method is called just before the method. 如果对的`true` 调用具有取消共享行的效果, 则该方法必须返回。It must return `true` if the call to has the effect of unsharing the row. 否则应返回`false` 。It should return `false` otherwise. 有关行共享的详细信息, 请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 SPACE 键激活时, 此方法将更新单元格的用户界面 (UI)。When activated by the SPACE key, this method updates the cell's user interface (UI). 此方法类似于方法。This method is similar to the method. 在引发事件的相同情况下, 它会被调用, 但实际上不会引发事件。It is called in the same circumstances in which a event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，此值指示所属列的文本是否出现在由单元格显示的按钮上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the owning column's text will appear on the button displayed by the cell.

value.span: 如果 属性的值能自动匹配所属列 属性的值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the property will automatically match the value of the property of the owning column; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按钮单元格的显示为按钮上的文本。The of a button cell is displayed as text on the button. 属性允许您设置每个单元的按钮文本, 或者使用所有按钮单元的父列的属性值。 The property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the property value of the parent column for all of the button cells. 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的属性,并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值, 请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#010)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#010)]
